授業目的: Intensive summer course. Students will attend 7 consecutive days on campus (8 hours a day), and join group activities. The theme is "Watch the Skies" - Aliens are coming to the earth and the major nations will decide what do with them. Until the final presentation, students will act as their nation's representative, spies to get information about the other nations, and meeting attendees to reach consensus.
到達目標: Students will acquire skills for discussion, negotiation and presentation.
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
